The Harry Potter series was written by J.K. Rowling
The first book in the series is Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, published in 1997
The series consists of seven books
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone is the U.S. title of the first book
The final book in the series is Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Harry Potter was born on July 31, 1980
The Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry is the main setting of the series
Hogwarts is divided into four houses: Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, and Hufflepuff
Gryffindor House is known for bravery and chivalry
Slytherin House values cunning and ambition
Ravenclaw House prizes wisdom and learning
Hufflepuff House is known for loyalty and hard work
Harry Potter's best friends are Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley
The series features a magical currency called Galleons, Sickles, and Knuts
The Hogwarts sorting ceremony is done by the Sorting Hat
The Triwizard Tournament is a magical competition held every five years
The magical sport Quidditch is played on broomsticks
Harry Potter's wand is made of holly and has a phoenix feather core
Hermione Granger's wand is made of vine wood and dragon heartstring
Ron Weasley's wand is made of willow and unicorn hair
The magical creature Dobby is a house-elf
Harry's nemesis is Lord Voldemort
The Dark Mark is the symbol used by Death Eaters
The Marauder's Map is a magical map that shows the entire layout of Hogwarts
The Room of Requirement appears only when someone is in great need of it
Hogwarts has a hidden chamber called the Chamber of Secrets
The Philosopher's Stone grants immortality
Harry Potter's parents, James and Lily Potter, were killed by Voldemort
Voldemort's real name is Tom Riddle
Harry Potter is known as the Boy Who Lived
Harry has a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead
Harry's owl, Hedwig, is a snowy owl
The Horcrux is an object in which a dark wizard hides a part of their soul
The Elder Wand is one of the Deathly Hallows
The Invisibility Cloak is another of the Deathly Hallows
The Resurrection Stone is the third Deathly Hallow
Harry Potter's godfather is Sirius Black
The Weasley family has seven children
The Weasley family's home is called The Burrow
The Hogwarts library contains a book called 'The Monster Book of Monsters'
Professor Albus Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts for most of the series
Severus Snape is the Potions Master at Hogwarts
The Sorting Hat was created by the four founders of Hogwarts
The Hogwarts Express is the train that takes students to Hogwarts
Diagon Alley is a hidden street where witches and wizards shop for magical items
Gringotts Wizarding Bank is run by goblins
The Leaky Cauldron is a pub that serves as a gateway to Diagon Alley
The Daily Prophet is the primary newspaper in the wizarding world
Hogwarts founder, Godric Gryffindor, was known for bravery
Helga Hufflepuff was known for loyalty and hard work
Rowena Ravenclaw valued intelligence and wit
Salazar Slytherin was known for cunning and ambition
The Dark Lord's Horcruxes must be destroyed to defeat him
The Sorting Hat song changes every year
The Weasleys' family clock tracks the location of each family member
Professor McGonagall teaches Transfiguration
Rubeus Hagrid is the Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts
The Forbidden Forest is located on the grounds of Hogwarts
The Whomping Willow is a magical tree that attacks anyone who comes too close
The Triwizard Tournament features three magical schools: Hogwarts, Beauxbatons, and Durmstrang
Harry Potter's main adversary in the Triwizard Tournament is Cedric Diggory
The Veela are magical creatures who resemble beautiful women and can enchant men
The Goblet of Fire selects champions for the Triwizard Tournament
Harry's wand is also connected to Voldemort's wand
The Half-Blood Prince is the title of the sixth book
The Horcruxes include Tom Riddle's diary, Marvolo Gaunt's ring, Salazar Slytherin's locket, Helga Hufflepuff's cup, Rowena Ravenclaw's diadem, and Nagini
Nagini is Voldemort's pet snake and a Horcrux
The prophecy states that neither Harry nor Voldemort can live while the other survives
The Battle of Hogwarts takes place in the final book
The character of Luna Lovegood is known for her eccentricity and kindness
The name 'Hogwarts' comes from a plant mentioned in a botanical book
The character of Gellert Grindelwald is a dark wizard who precedes Voldemort
Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them is a spin-off film series set in the Harry Potter universe
The Deathly Hallows symbol is a triangle with a line through it representing the three Hallows
The Pensieve is a magical device used to review memories
The Unforgivable Curses are Avada Kedavra, Crucio, and Imperio
The Imperius Curse allows the caster to control another's actions
The Cruciatus Curse inflicts intense pain on the victim
The Avada Kedavra Curse causes instant death
The Weasley twins, Fred and George, run a joke shop called Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes
The Horcruxes must be destroyed beyond magical repair to be truly destroyed
The Resurrection Stone can bring back shadows of the dead
The Basilisk is a giant serpent that lives in the Chamber of Secrets
The Polyjuice Potion allows a person to take on the appearance of someone else
The Death Eaters are followers of Voldemort
The Patronus Charm is used to ward off Dementors
Harry's Patronus is a stag
Hermione Granger's Patronus is an otter
Ron's Patronus is a Jack Russell Terrier
The invisibility cloak was originally owned by Ignotus Peverell
The Triwizard Cup is the prize for winning the Triwizard Tournament
The Hogwarts founders each created magical objects known as the Founders' Relics
The Sorting Hat was made from the hat of Godric Gryffindor
The Marauder's Map was created by James Potter, Sirius Black, Remus Lupin, and Peter Pettigrew
The Hogwarts grounds include a large lake and a large black lake
The Room of Requirement can be anything the user needs it to be
The Fidelius Charm is a powerful spell used to hide secrets
The Cloak of Invisibility is one of the three Deathly Hallows
The Quidditch World Cup is a major international sporting event in the wizarding world

The Goblin Rebellion is a significant event in the history of the wizarding world
The Black family tapestry shows the family tree of Sirius Black's family

The Ministry of Magic is the governing body of the magical community in Britain

The Mirror of Erised shows a person their deepest desires
